definition: to spy upon/to lie in wait for (an opportunity)

sentences.english: There's no suspicion of being shadowed so far.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，好像還沒有疑心到有人窺伺。

sentences.english: She watches him as a cat would watch a mouse.
sentences.chinese: 她頂着他就像貓在窺伺老鼠。

sentences.english: For prying beneath and forcing the lids of sight.
sentences.chinese: 窺伺俯望，撥開視界的眼瞼。

sentences.english: And now, it just after hearing stories of little daughter ghost in the watch for?
sentences.chinese: 而此刻，那剛聽完故事的小女兒鬼鬼地在窺伺着什麼？

definition: lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
to ask oneself honestly/to search in one's heart
running of armed forces/military management/to govern armed forces/to direct troops
see 臨陣退縮|临阵退缩[lin2 zhen4 tui4 suo1]
to keep quiet out of fear (idiom)
important matter that must be kept secret (idiom); don't breathe a word of it to anyone!
forged book/book of dubious authenticity/misattributed book/Apocrypha
to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
